div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 125 Attica, c. 1937 (606) Burial: late 4th-early 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 600 AR Athens tetradr. ANS 1944.100.24310 ANS 1944.100.24309 ANS 1944.100.24308 ANS 1944.100.24306 ANS 1944.100.24312 ANS 1944.100.24313 ANS 1944.100.24307 Disposition: Athens 162; New York 7 and photos of 84 others BCH 1939, p. 288 (4 coins) Information from E. T. Newell and W. Schwa- bacher. The findspot in one report is given as Sunium and in another as Piraeus
